# STATS::STAT_GET_CURRENT_FRONT_WHEEL_DISTANCE

## Summary
Get the current value of the front wheel distance

## Returns
* **FLOAT**

## Description
<!-- AUTOGENERATED: Remove this line before editing -->
Perform the longest stoppie on a motorcycle
